channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jeff Bezos’s honeymoon plans involved a $5.7 billion Amazon share selloff
item.description: Despite the large, prearranged sales, Bezos still holds roughly 884 million Amazon shares and maintains a net worth of $252 billion.

item.title: Flex’s CEO took the job without industry experience. One battle-tested playbook guided every move
item.description: Flex’s CEO didn’t pretend to know the business when she assumed the corner office. Instead, she stuck to what she could control.

item.title: Take a Vacation Already. The Pope Says So
item.description: And make time for others.

item.title: Why companies are leaning into skills-first, AI-enabled employment models
item.description: Moving away from job-centric structures may become more common.

item.title: Trump Administration’s Deal with Columbia Is Encouraging
item.description: The strategy is a sensible one, and other schools should follow.

item.title: Ohio Joins the Flat Tax Revolution
item.description: Its new tax will be the second-lowest in the country, which is good for the state and bodes well for the nation.

item.title: Meet the ‘masters of the universe’ heading up the private credit explosion
item.description: Ares Management has become one of the top alternative asset managers in the red-hot field, with aims to grow to $750 billion.

item.title: Young people aren’t anti-capitalist. They’re just sick of corporate hypocrisy
item.description: Zohran Mamdani's New York City mayoral primary win sparked major questions about what Gen Z wants from both their political and business leaders.

item.title: Trump hits EU for lack of Gaza aid, says Israel needs to 'make a decision' with Hamas not releasing hostages
item.description: President Donald Trump says Hamas is reluctant to release the remaining hostages amid Israel's increase in humanitarian aid efforts in Gaza on Sunday.

item.title: Tracing the Sexual Revolutions
item.description: Our current sexual revolution harkens back to dark periods in human affairs.
